revision.text:
<noinclude>'''Changes to this page should first be discussed on [[Wikipedia:Village pump (technical)]] or [[Wikipedia talk:Gadget]].'''
Please add an entry for any new gadget to the table at [[Wikipedia:Gadget#Currently installed gadgets]] to make maintenance easier. Links to view and manage the gadget descriptions appear on [[Special:Gadgets]]. </noinclude>

[[MediaWiki:Gadgets-definition|Definitions]] · [[Special:Gadgets|Descriptions]]
Below is a list of custom features ("[[Wikipedia:Gadget|gadgets]]") you may enable for your account. Most of them require JavaScript to be enabled in your browser. These tools are not part of the MediaWiki software, and are usually developed and maintained by editors on Wikipedia. Gadgets may malfunction or become inoperable due to software changes. You may report errors with gadgets to the appropriate [[Wikipedia:Village pump (technical)|village pump]]. Gadgets will not operate on certain special pages, such as this User Preferences page. Some options are only available for certain [[Wikipedia:Skin|skins]]. The numbers of users for each gadget on this wiki are listed at [[Special:GadgetUsage|Gadget usage statistics]]. Gadget legend: *(D): These gadgets are enabled by default *(E): These gadgets use code from external (third party) systems not subject to the WMF Privacy Policy *(S): These gadgets use code from WMF sister projects, managed by that project's administrators *(U): These gadgets use code maintained by a single user {{ombox | text = Be advised that '''you take full responsibility for any action performed''' using these features. For more information see our '''[[Wikipedia:Policies and guidelines|policies and guidelines]]'''. }}
Browsing
Watchlist
Editing
Appearance
Advanced

revision.comment: New gadget section "Maintenance and administration", per suggestion at [[Wikipedia:Village_pump_(technical)/Archive_177#XFDcloser gadget?]]
revision.text: Maintenance and administration
Testing and development
Utility modules
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> After rolling back a user's edit, automatically open their contributions page
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> Require confirmation before performing rollback on mobile devices

revision.comment: Fixing a link - this refers to the Wikipedia shortcuts, nmot to access keys in general
revision.text: Disable [[Wikipedia:Keyboard shortcuts|access key]]s
Focus the cursor in the search bar on loading the Main Page

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-external}}">(E)</abbr></sup> <sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-user}}">(U)</abbr></sup> [[User:Endo999/GoogleTrans|GoogleTrans]]: open a translation popup for the selected text or the word under the cursor when pushing the shift button
[[:commons:Help:Gadget-ImageAnnotator|ImageAnnotator]]: view image notes and comments on file description pages
Redirect image links to Commons for files hosted there
[[Wikipedia:Tools/Navigation popups|Navigation popups]]: article previews and editing functions pop up when hovering over links
Open external links in a new tab or window
Open search results in a new tab or window when holding down the Ctrl key
[[User:TheDJ/Print options|Print options]]: control how pages are printed (for example, remove images or backgrounds)
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> [[User:DerHexer/revisionjumper|revisionjumper]]: quickly navigate between page revisions

revision.comment: Specify that it adds menu buttons (vague since (for now, anyway) only Vector gets menus)
revision.text: [[Wikipedia:Twinkle|Twinkle]]: add menu buttons to automate common tasks, including: reporting vandalism, warning vandals, requesting deletion or protection, welcoming users, and tagging articles ([[Wikipedia:Twinkle/Preferences|preferences]])
A library with lots of useful features, used for [[Wikipedia:Twinkle]] but available for other gadgets or scripts. You should not be able to see this from Special:Preferences.
Components for the [[Wikipedia:Twinkle|Twinkle]] gadget

jQuery replacement for select boxes; used by Twinkle but available as a gadget for others. Available under the MIT license, see https://select2.org/. You should not be able to see this from Special:Preferences.

Suppress display of all [[meta:CentralNotice|CentralNotices]] (To suppress only certain classes of notices use the [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-centralnotice-banners|Banners option in preferences]])

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> [[mw:Reference Tooltips|Reference Tooltips]]: hover over inline citations to see reference information without moving away from the article text (does not work if "Navigation popups" is enabled above)
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> [[meta:Meta:FormWizard|FormWizard]]: a [[w:wizard (software)|wizard]] for creating and expanding project pages
Components for [[:meta:Meta:FormWizard|FormWizard]]
Improved appearance for mobile, narrow and wide screens. Used by Gadget-responsiveContent
Responsive content for Base Timeless
[[Wikipedia:Prosesize|Prosesize]]: add a toolbox link to show the size of and number of words in a page
[[User:SD0001/find-archived-section|find-archived-section]]: navigate easily to an archived section after following its broken link
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> [[Wikipedia:Geonotice|Geonotice]]: display notices on your [[Special:Watchlist|watchlist]] about events in your region
Additional components used with the Geonotice gadget
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> Display [[Wikipedia:Watchlist notices|watchlist notices]]
Components for the watchlist notice gadget
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> <small>(This loads the [[MediaWiki:Gadget-WatchlistBase.css|base style]] for the watchlist. Please do not disable this option.)</small>

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> Display green collapsible arrows and green bullets for changed pages in your watchlist, page history and recent changes (unavailable with the improved Watchlist user interface)

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> Display green collapsible arrows and green bullets for changed pages in your Watchlist, History and Recent changes (unavailable with the improved Watchlist user interface)
Display pages on your watchlist that have changed since your last visit in '''bold''' (see [[Wikipedia:Customizing watchlists|customizing watchlists]] for more options)

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> Subtle update marker: Tone down the "Changed since last visit" indicator on history pages. (By default it renders as a green-filled bar, enabling this gadget changes it to green text.)
Add two new dropdown boxes below the edit summary box with some useful default summaries
[[WP:Citation expander|Citation expander]]: automatically expand and format citations using [[WP:UCB|Citation bot]]

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> [[mw:User:Remember the dot/Syntax highlighter|Syntax highlighter]]: Alternative to the default coloring of wiki syntax in the edit box (works best in [[Mozilla Firefox|Firefox]] and works almost all of the time in [[Google Chrome|Chrome]] and [[Opera (web browser)|Opera]])
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> [[WP:HOTCAT|HotCat]]: easily add, remove, and change categories on a page, with name suggestions ([[:File:HotCat.png|example]])
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-user}}">(U)</abbr></sup> [[User:Cacycle/wikEdDiff|wikEdDiff]]: improved diff view between article versions (not needed if [[User:Cacycle/wikEd|wikEd]] is used)

(S) [[Wikipedia:ProveIt|ProveIt]] is a tool that adds a graphical user interface to find, edit, add and cite references ([{{fullurl:Fallacy|action=edit&withJS=MediaWiki:Gadget-ProveIt.js&withCSS=MediaWiki:Gadget-ProveIt.css}} demo])

[[Wikipedia:ProveIt|ProveIt]] (classic version) is a tool that adds a graphical user interface to find, edit, add and cite references ([{{fullurl:Fallacy|action=edit&withJS=MediaWiki:Gadget-ProveIt-classic.js&withCSS=MediaWiki:Gadget-ProveIt-classic.css}} demo]). This is the classic, original version of the gadget.
[[Wikipedia:Shortdesc helper|Shortdesc helper]]: easily add and edit page [[Wikipedia:Short description|short descriptions]]
Components for the short description helper gadget
Component for the library settings gadget

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-user}}">(U)</abbr></sup> [[en:User:Cacycle/wikEd|wikEd]]: alternative full-featured integrated text editor for [[Mozilla Firefox|Firefox]], [[Safari (web browser)|Safari]], and [[Google Chrome]] ([[en:User:Cacycle/wikEd help|documentation]])

revision.comment: update per mabdul, more links + FFU
revision.text: [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Articles for creation/Helper script|Yet Another AFC Helper Script]]: easily review [[WP:AFC|Articles for creation]] submissions, [[WP:FFU|Files for Upload]], [[WP:AFC/R|redirect and category]] requests

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> [[mw:extension:CharInsert|CharInsert]]: add a toolbar under the edit window for quickly inserting wiki markup and special characters ([[WP:VPT|troubles?]])
Components for the CharInsert gadget
[[Wikipedia:Legacy_toolbar|Enable the legacy (2006) editing toolbar]]. This will be overridden by the "Enable the editing toolbar" option in the Editing tab.
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> Add extra buttons to the legacy (2006) editing toolbar
Adds extra buttons to the old (non-enhanced) editing toolbar
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> [[Wikipedia:RefToolbar|refToolbar]]: add a "cite" button to the editing toolbar for quick addition of commonly used citation templates
Components for the refToolbar gadget
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> EditNoticesOnMobile - enables [[Wikipedia:Editnotice|editnotices]] for mobile editors. ([[Wikipedia:EditNoticesOnMobile|documentation)]]
Add an [edit] link for the [[Wikipedia:Lead section|lead section]] of a page

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> Add a clock to the personal toolbar that displays the current time in [[UTC]] and provides a link to [[Wikipedia:Purge|purge]] the current page ([[mw:MediaWiki talk:Gadget-UTCLiveClock.js|documentation]])
Components for the UTCLiveClock gadget
Add a "Purge" option to the top of the page, which [[Wikipedia:Purge|purges]] the page's cache
Add a selector to the Wikipedia [[Special:Search|search]] page allowing the use of external search engines
Allow navigation menus to be collapsed
Allow toggling between tabs and dropdown menus ([[User talk:Edokter/MenuTabsToggle.js|bug reports]])
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> [[Meta:MoreMenu|MoreMenu]]: add Page and User dropdown menus to the toolbar with links to common tasks, analytic tools and logs
Components for [[m:MoreMenu|MoreMenu]] gadget

revision.comment: standardize, simplify; remove note about Monobook since this seems to work on Vector too...
revision.text: Place the category box above all other content
Replace the "new section" tab text with "+"

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-user}}">(U)</abbr></sup> Change [[Coordinated Universal Time|UTC]]-based times and dates, such as those used in signatures, to be relative to local time ([[Wikipedia:Comments in Local Time|documentation]])
Display diffs with the old yellow-and-green colors and design
Disable animations in the interface
Disable the suggestions dropdown-lists of the search fields
Disable smaller font sizes of elements such as infoboxes, navboxes and reference lists
Display a floating alert for new talk page messages
Display an [[:Category:Wikipedia 1.0 assessments|assessment]] of an article's quality in its page header ([[Wikipedia:Metadata gadget|documentation]])
Justify paragraphs
Move section [edit] links to the right side of the screen
[[commons:Help:Gadget-PrettyLog|PrettyLog]]: format [[Special:Log|log]] pages like [[Special:Search|search]] results, and add small thumbnails for file uploads
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> Show radio buttons to switch between views of certain content, such as some maps
[[User:Equazcion/SidebarTranslate|SidebarTranslate]]: display sidebar language links in English

revision.comment: don't need to specify that in the description. gadgets only show in the skins they are compatible with for a long time now.
revision.text: Use a black background with green text
[[Wikipedia:Dark mode (gadget)|Dark mode]] toggle: Enable a toggle for using a light text on dark background color scheme
Vector classic typography (use only sans-serif in Vector skin)

revision.comment: remove full stop for consistency with other gadget descriptions
revision.text: Widen the search box in the Vector skin
Display links to [[Help:Disambiguation|disambiguation pages]] in orange
Strike out usernames that have been blocked
Improved appearance for mobile, narrow and wide screens ([[User:TheDJ/responsiveContent|documentation]])
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-default}}">(D)</abbr></sup> Improved appearance for mobile and narrow screens

revision.comment: [[WP:AES|←]]Created page with 'Do not show search results for sister projects on the search results page'
revision.text: Do not show search results for sister projects on the search results page
[[mw:XTools|XTools]]: dynamically show statistics about a page's history under the page heading

<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> Add a sidebar menu of user-defined regex tools, with a dynamic form for instant one-use regex ([[m:User:Pathoschild/Scripts/Regex menu framework|documentation]])
Add a toolbox link to reload the current page with the [[Special:AllMessages|system message names]] exposed
Add a toolbox link to reload the current page with Resource Loader in [[mw:ResourceLoader/Features#Debug mode|debug mode]]

revision.comment: 11 years later, I don't think we need to link to this specific section
revision.text: Allow /16, /24 and /27 – /32 [[CIDR]] ranges on [[Special:Contributions]] forms, as well as wildcard prefix searches (e.g., "Splark*") ([[MediaWiki talk:Gadget-contribsrange.js|report issues]])
Enable tracking bugs on Phabricator using the {{tl|tracked}} template
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> [[m:User:Krinkle/RTRC-docs|Real-Time Recent Changes]]: patrol recent changes in real-time (unpatrolled filter only works for new pages)
Install scripts without having to manually edit JavaScript files ([[User:Enterprisey/script-installer|documentation]])
[[WP:XFDC|XFDcloser]]: close deletion discussions at XfD venues, including actions to implement closes
Components for the XFDcloser gadget
Beta testing components for XFDcloser gadget

revision.comment: Evad37 moved page [[MediaWiki:Gadget-extra]] to [[MediaWiki:Gadget-libExtraUtil]] without leaving a redirect: more descriptive gadget name, per [[WP:IANB#XFDcloser gadgetification]]
revision.text: Utility gadget. You should not be able to see this from Special:Preferences.

revision.comment: note Vector only, see talk - phab issue tracked
revision.text: Mobile sidebar preview: show page in mobile view while browsing the desktop site ([[Wikipedia:Vector|Vector]] skin only)
<sup><abbr title="{{int:gadgets-sister}}">(S)</abbr></sup> [[m:Meta:AddMe|AddMe]]: endorse or join a project using {{tl|Probox}}
New image thumb design, and other minor styling tweaks (TOC, categories). [[MediaWiki talk:Gadget-NewImageThumb|Discuss]].
Make headers of tables display as long as the table is in view, i.e. "sticky" (requires Chrome v91+, Firefox v59+, or Safari)

revision.comment: [[WP:AES|←]]Created page with 'Add map popups to coordinates in the mobile website'
revision.text: Add map popups to coordinates in the mobile website
Show an alert when you encounter JavaScript errors

revision.comment: Link to [[Wikipedia:Short description]] per talk page request
revision.text: Show [[Wikipedia:Short description|page description]] beneath the page title (not compatible with Page assessments gadget)
Auto-number headings: Adds hierarchical outline-style numbering to headers in articles ([[:mw:Snippets/Auto-number headings|documentation]])

revision.comment: Utility gadget. You should not be able to see this from Special:Preferences.
revision.text: Utility gadget. You should not be able to see this from Special:Preferences.
